title: Map_and_Guide_Professional_v2008_Europa_City
description:
ENGLISH:
========
Map and Guide Professional is a high-end type of route planner. Premium functions are such as alternative routing, vehicle manager, address manager and toll calculation. Version 2008 has maps from early 2008.
Software comes in five languages: Dutch, English, French, German and Italian.

Included is "map Europe City" which has all streets in Austria, Belgium, Czech, France, Germany, Great Britain, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Scandinavia, Spain and Switzerland. 
All other European countries are contained with main roads only.

more info: <a href="
http://www.mapandguide.com/mgprofessional_com.MapGuide" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.mapandguide.com/mgprofessional_com.MapGuide</a>

Torrent contains two ISOs of DVD 1 (program) and DVD 2 (map). 
Instructions:
1 burn or mount DVDs.
2 Install programm first.
3 READ AND FOLLOW instructions in CYGiSOreadme.txt !!!
4 install map then. SN in CYGiSOreadme.txt

User manuals in PDF format in 5 languages are on DVD 1 .
